tool_description: Used to check if the vendor has a valid fssai certificate to produce and sell food and beverages.
title: FSSAI License Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Fssai verification API (async)
api_list.description:
Used to verify and food and beverage manufacturing vendor.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fssai-license-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_fssai"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fssai-license-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://fssai-license-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_fssai"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fssai-license-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_fssai"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
